body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Ronald Cook and the customer's name is Abigail Wilson.  The conversation is about Old Stone Stocks (a Brokerage Company ) and is a conversation about privacy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Sarah, and I am with EasyTech Solutions.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Sarah, nice to meet you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's great to meet you too! May I ask for your name?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John! To help you better, could you please provide me with your email address?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that. And could you also confirm your phone number for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's one two three four five six seven eight.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it! Thank you for providing that information, John.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: If you have any other questions or need assistance, feel free to ask.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I think I am good for now.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! Thank you for your time, John. Have a wonderful day!
